attributes.action: Northampton Market Square will be closed
attributes.additional_details: After open The new Bus station near the Local Market Square the council make many mistakes including not have a planing or drill in case of accidents, fire or any criminal or terrorist issue in the Bus Station. The security drill include the Area of Market Square populate for the local traders. Northampton Borough Council planning now to close for ever the legendary Local Market . We need to stop that plans, compensations to traders not solve destroy the heritage and business in the Town Centre. Please sign and save the Town Centre
